name: Status Changes in Footer Only
goal: Remove status messages from chat buffer when switching models or changing thinking levels - let the footer reflect these changes silently

features.description: Remove showStatus call for model switching

steps: Press Ctrl+L to open model selector
Verify NO 'Switched to X' message appears in chat
Verify footer shows new model name

features.description: Remove showStatus call for thinking level cycling

steps: Run po with a thinking-capable model
Press Shift+Tab to cycle thinking level
Verify NO 'Thinking level: X' message appears in chat
Verify footer shows new thinking level (e.g., 'claude-opus-4-5 â€¢ medium')

features.description: Remove showStatus call for thinking block visibility toggle

steps: Press Ctrl+T to toggle thinking visibility
Verify NO 'Thinking blocks: hidden/visible' message appears in chat

constraints: Only remove showStatus calls for model/thinking changes
Keep other showStatus calls intact (errors, navigation, etc.)
Footer already updates automatically - no changes needed there
